description:
As a poker platform supporting multiple concurrent players
  I want to verify complete game cycles with all poker actions across multiple browser instances
  So that chip calculations and game state remain accurate through extended gameplay

elements.name: Three Complete Games with All Poker Actions

steps.name: I have a clean poker table "FullGameTable" with 6 seats
I have 3 browser instances with players seated:
all players can see the initial seating arrangement
all players have their starting chip counts verified
the game starts automatically with enough players
the game should start in all browser instances
all players should receive 2 hole cards each
the preflop betting round should be complete
the flop is dealt with 3 community cards
all browser instances should show 3 community cards
the flop betting round should be complete
all browser instances should show 4 community cards
the turn betting round completes with actions
all browser instances should show 5 community cards
the river betting round completes with final actions
the winner should be determined and pot distributed
all chip counts should be accurate in all browser instances
the dealer button should move appropriately
side pots should be calculated correctly
chip distribution should be accurate across all browsers
players execute complex betting patterns throughout all streets
all actions should be processed correctly
final chip counts should be mathematically correct
all browser instances should show identical final states

elements.name: High-Frequency Action Execution Across Multiple Games

steps.name: I have a clean poker table "FullGameTable" with 6 seats
I have 4 browser instances with players seated:
players execute rapid action sequences across 3 games:
all actions should be processed correctly
chip calculations should remain accurate throughout
all browser instances should maintain synchronization
I have a clean poker table "FullGameTable" with 6 seats
I have 6 browser instances with players seated:
all edge cases should be handled correctly
game state should remain consistent across all browsers
I have a clean poker table "FullGameTable" with 6 seats
I have 6 browser instances ready for extended gameplay
10 consecutive games are played with full action coverage
each game includes all possible poker actions
the system should maintain performance standards:
all browser instances should remain responsive

name: Multi-Player Full Game Cycle with Comprehensive Actions
